name: Whale Is Love (GGJ 2017)
description:
Sing as the adorable whale Lucy to bring love to all depressed spacequatic creatures in the Universe!

A good microphone is required to play this game.

Use arrow keys or WASD or joypad to move the whale, and the sing in the microphone to shoot. The lower you sing the wider is the projectile. When you sing higher the projectile goes further away.
